Reviews.Content: This is my 5th Android device and wow is this device good.  I usually root a device on the first day...it's been a couple of months and I still have the stock image, not rooted...it's that good.  The processor is crazy fast, RAM hasn't maxed out yet even though I have 30-40 apps running sometimes, and the USB, extra memory card space, and HDMI output is just icing on the cake (though these are typical Android device features).  I am very pleased with the device and take it to meetings as well as the couch.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: The Hobo
Reviews.Content: Everything was excellent, just need to learn how to use all functions. It is taking time. it has been a pleasure.

Reviews.Title: Good buy;
Reviews.Author: BLM789
Reviews.Content: Excellent screen; numerous apps to load; great battery life, good price; excellent choice if you don't need phone capabilities; highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Nothing bad
Reviews.Author: Iuliia Larina
Reviews.Content: This pad was like expected, just make sure you oder right case, because MeMO pad 10 has few different models

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet Great Price
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Hamden "ghamden"
Reviews.Content: Great tablet it is fast , well designed. Asus did great jo b  well built it came 4.22 updated to 4.3 hopefully 4.4 is in its future

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this tablet
Reviews.Author: Dan Radatz
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet for well over a month and use it daily.  The only complain I have is with the display brightness.  Dark movie scenes can be difficult to see.  HD movies play without any issues and the display resolution and color is great.

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Father of 2"
Reviews.Content: Great tablet at a great price. Wasn't sure about the brand (never had Asus before) but my Galaxy Tab was in need of replacement. I have to say I am very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Two Weeks And Doin' Great!
Reviews.Author: Damaso A. Joa "OK, No Longer the Only Hispani...
Reviews.Content: So far so good! There's been no down side to this tablet as of yet (I say this due to others complaining of loss due to multiple issues). I have received and experienced all the good, to this point, and wil come back in 6 months to update my experience(s)!The screen is wonderful, the sound great, speed/response time above expectation, I've loaded a significant amount of apps with no problems - I don't do games so I don't know if it is at all good with same(?). I'm using this for business and so far is living up to my expectations for work.

Reviews.Title: Item was great... but mine was defective
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The headphone connection and the charger connection did not connect.  Unable to charge and unable to hear through the headphones.  If these 2 items has worked it would have been a great tablet especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great specs and the best quality for a fair price.
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I always buy ASUStek over ANY other brands out there (have been doing it for decades now) and their products have never disappointed. Don't know if they still manufacture all of their own electronic parts exclusively in their own Taiwan facilities, but they certainly keep following the highest quality-control standards among the industry. You can feel it when you get a chance to enjoy this fast, responsive, BIG (10") tablet for the first time. Asus original software for book reading and library management includes built-in english TTS support for epub and it stands among the best available for Android today (including many paid, expensive alternatives). Performance doesn't even blink while playing games or watching HD videos in a big TV screen.

Reviews.Title: 10 " ASUS HD Tablet
Reviews.Author: Lee S.
Reviews.Content: The spousal unit likes the tablet a lot but mentioned it would have been nicer if ASUS had included printed out instructions with the tablet.  She is old fashioned and likes printed matter instead of having to look up the information on-line.

Reviews.Title: Works Awesome
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: Had to return several other cheaper tablets, but this one is a keeper. Definitely worth the money! Its fast, solid, and we have no complaints. Great tablet!!

Reviews.Title: great tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Andy A
Reviews.Content: bought this for my wife was easy to set up right out of the box and conects to the intenet great thoughout the house.only thing I didn't like is the same with all tablets ( i have a small tablet myself ) is the paper guides are worthless as far as setup what some of the preloaded services are and genarel cost of these services.

Reviews.Title: Quite Good
Reviews.Author: Leo Zichel
Reviews.Content: Good with that price. It can do almost things that I need on a tablet. Nothing to say more, lol!

Reviews.Title: Fast
Reviews.Author: Steven B.
Reviews.Content: Tablet works good. Only thing i dont like is screen get fingerprints easy.  But not a biggie i just clean it couple times a day. Or use a styla

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Vicky Kerley
Reviews.Content: My brother loved it.  It is super fast and exactly what he wanted in a tablet. It's not bogged down with useless apps

Reviews.Title: This is the second Asus I bought as the first stopped working in three days
Reviews.Author: f.l.avant
Reviews.Content: If this one will continue to preform as it does now you have a happy warrior as I'm still scared it may crash also.And if you send them back all your works can be unloaded by strangers(scary isn't it) still now I give great credit to the product except it is smarter than I am

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 2 months
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: The tablet powers off without warning, after only a few minutes of use. No longer usable, would return if I could.

Reviews.Title: The best tablet
Reviews.Author: Joseph Choi
Reviews.Content: I left this tablet in my car twice during winter. I thought something would go wrong with it the next day, but when I turned it on, all worked great. I even dropped it a few times (though I had a good leather cover), on hard floor and it still worked great. The power and speed is much better than Samsung. This is the best tablet I've owned and I would strongly recommend it others. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet BUT...
Reviews.Author: HDT
Reviews.Content: So far, i discover 2 things that do NOT work:1) Flash player. I download and install adobe flash player on this tablet and the stock browser never see it. The same procedure allows me to see flash player working on other table model (acer and Asus with arm cpu)2) I can not do MIRACAST to my android tv dongle with direct wifi. I can do that easily with Asus memotab 7 HD.---IT's 1.5 faster then tegra 3 according to antutu.Beautiful screen and sound. Everything works fine except those above!!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Brian Williams
Reviews.Content: only issue I got is sometimes video lags but I'm sure that's more software related than hardware. Other than that everything else is first class.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: ana guerra/ali zurita
Reviews.Content: is an excelent tablet, the best by price and valor, i recomedent this tablet for everyone. goog for asus. the best

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a non-high tech old guy.
Reviews.Author: Frierson Craig
Reviews.Content: My wife loves Apple products- Mac, iphone, iPad. She wanted to give me an iPad for Christmas. I did some research and discovered that even though this tablet might not be quite as sexy as an iPad, it would do what I needed at a much lower cost.I have added some apps and use the tablet mainly to read and compose email and search the web. It takes decent pictures and is pretty easy to set up and use.A good value for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely LOVE it
Reviews.Author: Margaret L. Betz "Jambini"
Reviews.Content: I have ZERO problems with this tablet.  It's easy to use - comfortable to use.  I LOVE it.  So much so that we just bought my husband a brand new one of another brand (was on a good sale or I would have gotten him one of these) and he offered to let me have my choice - this one - which is a month or two old - or the brand new one - and I kept mine!!  Can't say enough good things about it!!

Reviews.Title: Nice features for the Money
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Nice display high resolution, however screen is a little reflective and shows finger prints easily. The output ports hdmi audio usb, and speakers work without a hitch. OTG cable extends usb functionality. Plenty good for gaming and using internet. Battery is working as advertised around 9 or 10 hours light use 6 or 7 gaming. Micro sd expansion is nice for added storage. Camera is ok not great. Is pretty light paired with the IVSO slim case which I would also recommend. Fast and responsive enough for most tasks and games. For the money I think it is a great value compared to other tablets in the same price range. Even more expensive tablets lack key features that this one has.3 hundred for a protective case, otg usb cable, 32 gig micro sd card, tablet, and screen protectors is a major factor in my decision in buying this tablet.

Reviews.Title: not my favourite piece of technology, but were my expectations too high?
Reviews.Author: L. O. Rice "Amaryllis"
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me this because i use my phone so much and he thought i could use a bigger screen. It is very fast but many of the apps i use most such asmy bank app (pnc) and skype simply dont work, which sends me back to my phone. I find voice commands very useful, but when i use the microphone i get stuff like this which is it made me very intelligent. Which is not what i was trying to say. I also had to look round the house for somewhere i could see the screen which seems to be very reflective. This the third time ive had to restart this review because while typing somehow i seem to hit a button which dismisses the whole app.I love email on this device, especially long emails, estimates and such as i can see it all without scrolling. I dont play games much or watch video,  so maybe i am  just not a typical tablet user.This is the fourth time ive had to return to this review. I went to a meeting and found the notepad useful, but typing notes still seems ridiculously slow in comparison to writing them with a pen, but it does mean a single buttlon press and i can email the notes, which is great.One reviwer said that the 10 inch tablet was too big for a purse; it fits mine well, but ib comparison to  my husbands nexus and my sons kindle, it is rather heavy.If anyone has made skype work on this please say how!

Reviews.Title: Product Good
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Really like the product but the service was terrible!!! Site stated no S/H which they charged, but after complaining they did credit it back. However, was advertised as next day service - was received three (3) days later!!Lesson learned - don't believe everything you read on the site!!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: I have no major complaint for this tablet, video play back is very good battery life is based on what your are doing last a good 4hr just streaming video off the net longer for less power using apps

Reviews.Title: One of the best tablets.
Reviews.Author: Dr. C.
Reviews.Content: ASUS' Intel-powered MeMO Pad FHD 10 is an attractive Android tablet with above-average battery life, but its display doesn't dazzle.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: J. Del Bono Lonardi
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet for the price, I tested a lot of games and run smoothly, the screen response is perfect and I never noted any lag at all. Great Deal!!

Reviews.Title: As good as advertised
Reviews.Author: Bernard Higgins
Reviews.Content: I really like the tablet although the battery doesn't seem to last as long as advertised. All things considered though I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good mid range tablet for a good price.
Reviews.Author: Todd E. Grady
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a mid range tablet with a good display, this is it. I bought this tablet for my wife to use instead of us fighting over the laptop. She's been very pleased with it. The display is bright and crisp. It comes with Android 4.2 but you can download the 4.3 update right away.

Reviews.Title: great tablet for a teenager
Reviews.Author: Da
Reviews.Content: i bought this tablet for my 13yr old. The screen is bright and clear, great volume, and takes great pics.The only problem is that her camera kinda went out on it. She can still take pics but there r a bunch of lines that makes it hard to see what u r taking the pic of, but the actual poc comes out clear. To be honest, she could have done something to cause this problem. Her last tablet ended up with the same lines but on the main screen

Reviews.Title: works great.
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: It is working great so far, my one beef is I lost my email widget with no way to get it back as far as I can tell. Documentation and info seems to be very limited on this product, but the picture and functionality is excellent so far. I can easily recommend this at the price I bought it for, 3 or 4 hundred less than an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Alvaro Villamar
Reviews.Content: Great tablet - it's thin, lite, fast, great sound, crisp sharp video display, and the camera worked very well. Awesome!

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMO Pad FHD 10 ME302C-A1-BL 10.1-Inch 16GB Tablet (Blue)
Reviews.Author: PickAFlower
Reviews.Content: Great Buy! Look at the reviews for various tablet brands. If you like to shop around like me, you will find this brand (Asus) has great reviews from all tech guys and price-wise it is very economical when you get down to the nitty-gritty of the specs when comparing with other models and brands for 10-inch tablets. Works perfect no issues. Check out the Birugear Black SlimBook Leather Folio Stand Case Cover w/ Free screen protector And you will be all set to go!!! Trusted brand and arrives fast, You can't go wrong with this one!  ;-)

Reviews.Title: Love This Tablet
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Does everything I was hoping for. Great price too. I highly recommend buying it if you're looking for a android tablet!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my very first tablet (and my first foray into Android) and, for what I use it for, it works perfect for me.  Reading books, magazines and newspapers, watching movies/TV on Crackle, doing spreadsheets, etc. in Kingsoft Office – everything has worked as it should.  My only complaint is with several Google products “taking over” and doing things that I don’t want them to do - If I want something loaded, I’ll do it myself.  Other than that little thing, this tablet has been great.  I added a 32GB card to store all my pics and music on and everything has worked as it should. Same goes with the bluetooth keyboard cover - works great!  Great video and sound and it is the perfect size!

Reviews.Title: asus memo pad fhd 10me302c-a1-bl 10.1 inch 16gb tablet blue
Reviews.Author: willie smith
Reviews.Content: igave 5 stars its wonderful does every thing alright for me go buy one for your self works great i have had no issues with any programs thank you asus

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Jim in PA
Reviews.Content: The only complaint is all the extra crap software that gets loaded on it at the factory that you can't remove without root access.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Diana Bauer
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my grandchildren for Christmas. I also got them one the Christmas before, but they fought over it. Also put lots of games on it.  This time I got one with more memory.  So one is for games, and one is for everything else. Good value.

Reviews.Title: asus tablet
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Helmecy
Reviews.Content: Great tablet, fast, hd display, camera's take good pictures & videos, plenty of storage !  Great sound quality. Highly recommended !

Reviews.Title: It ok
Reviews.Author: Aquille Winchester
Reviews.Content: It was just as expected... I bought it for a friend and it never leaves his side. I own a Motorola Xoom FE and after purchase info this device for him, I am considering getting one for my self. I have played with it a few times since initial set up and haven't found any thing to complain about!!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: PBurns
Reviews.Content: This was a good purchase.  No remorse.  It is just what the reviews said it would be. The size means you need to get a case made for this model.

Reviews.Title: For the money, it can't be beaten. Great product at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Joe Pasko
Reviews.Content: Fantastic! Great battery life. Great screen and expandable storage. For the price, it's a steal. This tablet does everything I need it to without effort. Best tablet key layout I've used.

Reviews.Title: asus memo pad fhd10
Reviews.Author: David Farberow
Reviews.Content: I have not had good luck with mine so far as downloading certain apps like skype are getting stuck at 13% of the download and then I get some weird message.  I do like the convenience of easily just swiping the tablet to turn on and get emails and do research.  Unfortunately now my tablet starting playing the startup loop that you get when you first open your tablet for the first time, and I think it will require a reset.  Hopefully that will solve my download problems.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Journeyman
Reviews.Content: This is a great fast responding tablet. Quick on everything, streaming, uploading and downloading. You'll be pleased if you buy this unit. Best price was on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy With Purchase
Reviews.Author: Sue Perretta "At The Ocean"
Reviews.Content: This tablet has exceeded my expectations. It immediately became a substitute for my laptop for reading email, watching movies and reading.  The resolution is great for reviewing my photographs before I commit to printing them.  It is lightweight, crystal clear, and boots up very fast.  I chose ASUS because they manufactured my 7" Google Nexus and I love its look and feel.  I have already recommended this tablet to others.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've used an iPad and the samsung galaxy tablet, this is far superior to both in myopinion. very impressed indeed.

Reviews.Title: Great I cannot say one bad word.
Reviews.Author: Laura F. "Laura"

Reviews.Content: I purchased this item because of the great value.  An apple ipad was too expensive and I felt this did most of the same tasks as the Ipad for a fraction of the price.  I would recommend this item to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Asus Tablet
Reviews.Author: Sherri
Reviews.Content: I love love love love my new tablet.  Learning how to use it but so far love it.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Rz "rogerwz1"
Reviews.Content: Asus had it all for me but I bought a used one and it had a problem and had to return it but when working was great.

Reviews.Title: Best Price at the time
Reviews.Author: Loreliza S. Painter
Reviews.Content: Amazon had the best price at the time.  The screen is fantastic.  It looks as good as an apple products for way less money.  The Apps for Android based tablets are getting just as good too.  Love the affordability of Android products and ASUS seems to make one of the superior tablets.  I have the 1st gen nexus from ASUS and it is still going strong at almost 2 years.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: William F. Chinnock "willybanilly"
Reviews.Content: I'm not a techie. I've owned 2 tabs prior to this one: A Samsung Galaxy, and a Sony Xperia. This Asus tab is more affordable, much more, and beats both the Samsung and Sony in performance. The Samsung was quirky, and eventually the WiFi connection failed. Then I purchased a Sony Xperia, which has some impressive characteristics, like it's virtually waterproof. But, when I inserted the micro SD card, it would not recognize many files, like movies, and audio, that I was able to access on the Samsung Galaxy. So I returned that quickly. You need to have the micro SD card working, or why even have it.The Asus Memo tab appears on par with the Samsung in it's material and fabrication. I believe it is has a slightly quicker processor. The keyboard has been the most reliable and least idiosyncratic. It surfs the web well, and I've added a few movies to watch.Overall, it is on par or even better performance with the Samsung Galaxy and is more than $100 less in price. It's a no brainer. This is the best tab for the money, unless you want something very specific in the latest technology, then you'll have to pay for that elsewhere. I've already added a few apps too, and they are running fine.

Reviews.Title: FHD 10
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: I have been very pleased with this tablet.  It is responsive and has great clarity.  I like the feel and the weight of the device.  I highly recommend it versus more costly devices.

Reviews.Title: I like it.

Reviews.Content: Bought two for my parents.Very good tablet. Fast and clear.They like them. Hope they can find more fun.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMO Pad FHD 10 ME302C-B1-BL
Reviews.Author: Sergeis Derevinskis
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 2 of these over the last  year. The price, design and functionality are great.  Quality is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Super Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tim Avent
Reviews.Content: Graphics are terrific. Options are awesome.  Thin and light.  1.6 GHz is fast.  Get it for this price range over any other.

Reviews.Title: No Problems...
Reviews.Author: Our Adventure Chronicles "Our Adventure Chron...
Reviews.Content: I have been putting this tablet through its paces the last few days.  Everything has worked as promised.  I have looked for the issues that were written about in the previous reviews and so far haven't experienced any of them.The screen brightness that was discussed was fixed by taking it off of Automatic and setting it to my liking.One thing that users may need to be aware of is that you cannot just move apps to the external SD Card as you can on prior versions of the OS.  That is one of the reasons I went with the 32G model.As far as pricing...if you are considering purchasing this tablet make sure to check out the current price.  The price for this tablet can swing almost $60 depending on who the supplier is.This tablet is fast and display quality is very good.  I found the sound to also be acceptable.  It does have a limiter on volume when using a headset.  This can be overcome through third party software.Speaking of Apps...once I connected to Google Play and did a restore of all apps the tablet was hit with about 250 apps being installed very quickly.  Out of this number there were 6 that were not compatible with this tablet.  Also all apps work just as they should.Overall at the price point you can get this tablet for it is a very good value and I think most will be very happy.  One note though if you are coming from the latest generation IPAD or even a NEXUS I find this tablet to perform generally below those models in terms of display quality and speed.Don't get me wrong though -- for the price -- the performance of this tablet would be hard if not impossible to beat with any model.One last thing regarding WiFi...where I use this tablet we use a WiFi network that uses a zero hand-off system. This means that all APs are seen as one AP.The switch over between APs can be a challenge even for the  best devices.  I must tell you that this tablet has worked flawlessly between multiple APs and the speed at which it has negotiated this architecture has been the best I have seen among the hundreds of devices used here including laptops, phones and yes IPADS and Nexus devices.I am not sure what ASUS did on the WIFI portion of this tablet but it is impressive performance.I would highly recommend this tablet to even the most tech sensitive people I know and simply ask them to throw everything at it they can...I am convinced they will come to the same conclusion I have.

Reviews.Title: I wish I'd bought this the first time around!
Reviews.Author: miss-honesty "Tiffany"
Reviews.Content: I bought a cheaper, obselete brand for my mother for a Christmas gift. That said, its wifi was temperamental, the camera was hideously low resolution and the thing had no hook-up ports. After eating two hundred dollars in loss, I purchased this Asus. My mom who isn't very tech savvy said "It's like night and day!" I bet you can figure out what's the sunny day: this one. It has a USB hook up in case you want to attach a keyboard case to it. The screen is beautiful and crisp. The camera has a high resolution I compare to my iPhone. It is lighter than the Matricom I bought first. The wifi connects and stays connected without hiccups. I purchased the drops and spills plan because you never know: better safe than sorry. I am very pleased with this tablet and its price is competitive for its premium size. I also own an Asus laptop and vouch for the brand.

Reviews.Title: REally Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Pudas "God Bless"
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet. It is very functional and operates well. The only problems I saw is that you really can't open more than one window at a time (multi-tasking). You can open a floating window but you really can't have them open and usable at the same time. (Unless I'm missing something. I'm pretty good at figuring out how to do things and smartphones and a table basically is just a large smartphone that you can't make a phone call on.) I also wouldn't advise using an alternate browser such as go launcher even though it is supposedly made to use on a tablet. I found those slowed the tablet down and the launcher that it comes with, although not fancy, is more than adequate. It operates smoothly, screen looks good (I'm too old to see all that many pixels) and is pretty quick. Would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Jury is still out
Reviews.Author: Craig A Zar
Reviews.Content: This MeMo Tablet works great....fast, stable and with a good looking screen (despite snobbish reviews).  My only issue/concern is that the battery life seems to be NOTHING like my ASUS t300 Transformer.  I could leave it in sleep mode for days, literally, but the MeMo will not last more than 15 hours.  I have power management set to extreme.....screen off, wi-fi off, etc,  ASUS Account is eating up the battery even in sleep mode.  So bad, I am thinking I may have a defective battery or software.  The t300 Transformer battery life was fantastic.....very disappointed with the MeMo solely due to battery life.....itis faster and better than the t300 in every other aspect.UPDATE:  After snooping through Power Management, I disabled the app "ASUS Account" and has improved the battery life tremendously.  My last charge lasted almost 3 days with regular use (Facebook, Email, web browsing  and a few YouTube videos).  I have started manually turning off wi-fi, as the "OFF when in sleep mode" power mgmt option either doesn't work, or I have an App that re-opens wi-fi and eats the battery while in sleep mode.  Feeling MUCH better about the MeMo now, and upgraded from 3 to 4 stars.....I did see that Amazon has suspended sales of this unit due to a possible bad batch, so that might explain my power mgmt issues.  Otherwise, contrary to what others have reviewed I have no issues with Email (3 different accounts), app compatibility, or web browsing.  If power management worked as it should I would gladly give it ☆☆☆☆☆!Another Update:I no longer need to manually turn off wi-fi, evidently an update fixed that issue.  A single charge is now lasting as long as my ASUS T300 Transformer did (BEFORE I dropped it....oops).  I've been browsing for over 2 hours and still have over 80% of my battery left.  This MeMo tablet is inching closer to a 5☆ rating the longer I have it.  Loving it.....now.
